alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 5:48PM EDT until June 10 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... West central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Western Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Bratt to 5 miles east of Robertsdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ensley, Gonzalez, Robertsdale, Myrtle Grove and Molino. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
